shortDescription: ADR-172: Complete console.log to enterprise Logger migration across all 13 scoped directories + TS error fixes
problem: Hundreds of console.log/warn/error calls scattered across src/lib, src/config, src/core, src/auth, src/contexts, src/providers, src/i18n, src/adapters, src/schemas, src/constants, src/types, src/utils, src/api. Unstructured logging with no metadata, inconsistent formats, emoji-prefixed messages.
cause: Legacy development logging pattern. ADR-172 mandates migration to enterprise Logger (createModuleLogger from @/lib/telemetry) for structured, configurable, production-grade logging.

solution.phase1_lib_config_core: Migrated 46 files across src/lib, src/config, src/core — all console calls to logger.info/warn/error with structured metadata
solution.phase2_auth_types_api_adapters: Migrated 12 files across src/auth, src/types, src/api, src/adapters
solution.phase3_contexts_providers_i18n: Migrated 11 files across src/contexts, src/providers, src/i18n
solution.phase4_utils: Migrated 14 files across src/utils — including complex formDataMapper, photo-urls, data-cleaning
solution.phase5_ts_error_fixes: Fixed all TypeScript TS2345/TS2554 errors — wrapped string/array/interface metadata in Record<string, unknown> objects

testing.typescript: npx tsc --noEmit: 0 new errors (3 pre-existing in obligations/design-system/geo-canvas)
testing.deployment: Pushed to main for Vercel auto-deployment
testing.grepVerification: Final grep across all 13 directories confirmed 0 remaining console.log/warn/error calls (except Logger.ts itself and documentation files)

notes: All 13 scoped directories fully migrated to enterprise Logger
Skipped files: Logger.ts (is the logger), JSDoc examples, markdown docs, commented-out code
console.debug calls left as-is (not in migration scope)
TypeScript compilation errors fixed by wrapping non-object metadata in {key: value} objects
Logger signature: info/warn/error(message: string, metadata?: Record<string, unknown>)
Zero use of 'any' type — all enterprise TypeScript

commits.message: refactor(ADR-172): complete console.log to Logger migration across all 13 scoped directories
